message: Wrong order for 'android.app.Activity' import.
'com.actionbarsherlock.R' should be separated from previous imports.
Wrong order for 'com.actionbarsherlock.internal.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener' import.
'com.actionbarsherlock.internal.ResourcesCompat.getResources_getBoolean' should be separated from previous imports.
